about_the_game:
You abandoned your family, but even after everything that happened, they never forgot about you. Your home has always kept memories of you, of your childhood games, of joyful moments that no longer exist. But now that you've returned, the house greets you with a tense atmosphere, as if it knows about your dark secrets and regrets.

The Unvisited Grandma is a game that draws you into the depths of horror and mystery. The main character encounters visions that remind him of past sins and lost loves. With every step in the ominous rooms of the house, the player will understand himself and his past.

Features of the game include constant tension and an atmosphere that makes the player relive every minute of his stay in the house. Dark corridors and ominous rooms create a nervous atmosphere that immerses the player in a world of horror and fear.

But the most striking feature of The Unvisited Grandma is the visions that will appear as the game progresses. They will lead the player to reflect on his past decisions, the consequences of his actions, and the importance of accepting himself.

Prepare to delve into the dark secrets of your own life and prepare to confront your forbidden feelings and emotions. The Unvisited Grandma is a game that will make you see the truth and free yourself from the shadows of the past. Can you handle the horror staring you in the face?
